msbt.message: Ah, ! Absolutely perfect timing.Who's got the better hairstyle between and me?
You do.
It's .
I couldn't say.
Ha HA! Thanks for backing me up, .<20_3 arg="5" /><20_2 arg="5" />I don't want to say I told you so, butI SO TOLD YOU SO!
Bah! You kids just can't appreciate the classics.The best haircut ever was invented in 1952 and it ain't possible to improve upon it!
There you go! I knew you'd come through for this old silver , . Gahaha!
Alright, alrightâ€”I knew all along that had great hair This just makes me even more determined to up my own hair game. To the salon!
Oh, you're too polite. <10_4 />Seriously. Knock it off and give us an answer.
Gahaha! See? No one cares about hair as much as you do, .
Ah, ! Absolutely perfect timing.Who's got the better hairstyle between and me?
You do.
It's .
I couldn't say.
Ha HA! That's right!<20_2 arg="5" /><20_3 arg="5" />You should have known better than to get involved in a hair-off with me, !
Joke's on you, kiddo. I played this contest to lose!
What?! Do you need an eye exam or something? This wasn't supposed to happen
<20_2 arg="8" /><20_3 arg="8" />Yeah, I'm worried about your eyes too. My hair is terrible and gettin' worse, .
Alright, alright. You don't have to say it out loud, but we all know what the answer is.
Yeah! It's that in the grand scheme of things, havin' good hair just ain't that important. It's kindness and goodwill to your fellow , kiddo.
Did you know that I used to want to be a baseball player?It's true! Baseball is the most stylish sport, and you don't have to do anything 90 percent of the time.
Baseball, huh? Yeah, I could see you as a ballplayer.
Really? That means a lot coming from you. Because you seem like you're into sportsor something.

Well, sure, I used to play a game called -ball. It's all we had growin' up. I played eighth base, and one time I scored a trifecta in the bottom of the 17th quarter. Ah, but you probably don't wanna hear that old story again
and that's why I think that society places too little value on physical appearance, .
Didn't hear a thing you said, kiddo. Except for "." That sounded real interestin'
Really? ? To be honest, I used to say it lot more oftenBut if it stood out to you like that, maybe I should get it back into the regular rotation.
Yeah, wellit's like this. I'm feelin' a little self-conscious about gettin' older, y'see. And somethin' like "," well, it makes me feel young just sayin' it. I don't even know what it means!
Well, say it all you want, big guy. It'll just help grow the brand!
Alright, ! Heh. I'm gettin' the hang of it already.Now we'll see who's laughin' when I show up at the park and get down to business.
